name: Punk Star
overview: King Gapas has disinherited his son Punk. By order of the King, Punk has been banished to the hot dungeons below the castle where Gapas lives. The dungeons are guarded by Gachi, a tremendous and horrible wizard. The poor, how has to eat hamburgers all day and can not watch, sends some balls of ketchup and mustard. These balls subtract energy from Punkito, who is overwhelmed in the labyrinths of the dungeons. You have a chance to get out. You must find the 18 auroras that make the thirteen elements of which hamburgers are composed. Once the auroras are found, Punkito will have the same strength and energy as Gachi. When you have faced him you can exit the dungeons and settle scores with King Gapas.
